module.name: Mi-Tools
module.summary: MIUI v5 all in one module
module.description: MIUI v5 all in one module. It handles framework, statusbar, launcher, sound, MIUI applications modifications.
module.author: BurgerZ

version.changelog:
• Statusbar: fixed color settings for all statusbar icons
  • Launcher: added color settings for icons/folder labels
  • Updated translations

• Sound: added option to unlink Ringtone and Notifications volume controls
  • Statusbar: added battery icon color settings
  • Statusbar: added color settings for all statusbar icons (test mode)
  • Statusbar: fixed network speed view in expanded statusbar (now it shows not Rx speed, but Rx+Tx speed)
  • Statusbar: added format settings for clock date
  • Statusbar: fixed am/pm handling
  • Launcher: added multiline icons/folder labels switch
  • Updated translations

• Added Wind carrier logos (color and white)
  • Added Hex color value editor to color picker preferences
  • Fixed mobile network signal bars and wi-fi icon visibility for 2SIM phones with iOS7 clock layout
  • Fixed font adjustment for statusbar views
  • Added font style selection for system and apps settings - Bold or Normal
  • Fixed issue with statusbar layouts resetting to defaults while changing theme or system language
  • VOLUME STEPS mod temporary disabled due issues with phone volume (will be fixed soon)
  • Updated translations

• Added font size adjustment for launcher icons
  • Added launcher folders columns count settings
  • Added option to hide launcher hotseats (dock bar) labels (big thanks to Zirias from xiaomi.eu for more elegant way)
  • Fixed NavBar size in landscape mode
  • Added option to force disable album art auto download
  • Added localized measure units to FileExplorer and Kuaipan settings
  • Added carrier logos: Kyivstar (colored), MegaFon and MTS (3D), Tele2 (colored, square), life:) (colored and white), Kcell (colored and white), Smarts (colored and white)
  • Added option to change delay for uploading new photos to MiCloud (default delay is 1 minute)
  • Updated translations

• Added volume control steps ajustment
  • Added scrolling cache disable option
  • Added option to turn off auto updates check in SuperMarket and Updater apps
  • Added option to show Updater changelogs in English (for non-English locales)
  • Added new Beeline (simple white) carrier logo
  • Updated translations

• Themes: added reverse tabs order
  • Themes: added option to change lockscreen (try to change) lunar dates to gregorian ones
  • Added Vodafone carrier logos
  • Fixed Reboot options menu (issues with handling reboot options with less options selectes)
  • Added carrier logo selection for Dual-SIM devices
  • Fixed statusbar color settings
  • Added mobile network signal bars color settings (both for Single and Dual-SIM devices)
  • Supermarket: added reverse tabs order
  • Updated translations

• Added simple center clock option (with wi-fi and signal right)
  • Added MENU button double tap and long press events
  • Added more carrier logos
  • Added VOL keys text cursor control
  • Added Reboot menu entries selection
  • Small fixes
  • Added Hungarian translation (thanks to vagyula1)
  • Added Spain translation (thanks to rauldlnx10)
  • Added Chinese (Traditional) translation (thanks to RadarNyan)
  • Added Chinese (Taiwan) translation (thanks to Eric850130)

module.name: Reboot Options
module.summary: Adds reboot options to power menu
module.description:
Adds reboot options to power menu.

  • Common reboot
  • Hot reboot
  • Reboot to Recovery
  • Reboot to Bootloader
  • Switch system (Mi-phones)
module.author: BurgerZ

module.name: T9 Module
module.summary: Adds international contacts search to dialer.
module.description: Adds international contacts (and service numbers) search to dialer. After activating rebuild T9 index in Contacts application settings
module.author: BurgerZ

module.name: Browser Autofit
module.summary: Browser pages autofit
module.description: Adds "Mobile View" to the General browser settings. This feature allows you to adjust the text on Web pages to fit the width of the screen depending on the page font size.
module.author: BurgerZ

module.name: AlarmTime fix
module.summary: Fix for third-party alarms
module.description: Fixes rounding response time to 5 minutes for third-party alarm clocks.
module.author: BurgerZ

version.changelog: • Updated translations

module.name: Play Store Fixes
module.summary: Fake the density for Google Play Store
module.description: Fake the density that is submitted to Google in order to make Play Store show all apps.
module.author: rovo89

version.changelog: • Updated translations

module.name: Auto Orientation
module.summary: Landscape orientation in selected application
module.description:
Adds the ability to view applications in landscape mode. To make it work go to the device screen settings and activate "Auto-rotate screen" option.
On some devices may not be displayed correctly.
No need to reboot after changing settings.
module.author: BurgerZ

version.changelog: • Updated translations

module.name: Current Track Launch
module.summary: Launch the playback screen in the player
module.description: Allows you to launch playback screen of the current track in Music player when you click on a pop-up widget (opens by slide on the icon on home screen). By default, the main screen opens, like with a simple click on the player icon.
module.author: BurgerZ

module.name: Search in Google Play
module.summary: Adds an option to choose marketplace to use with search
module.description:
You can choose in module settings what marketplace should be used for searching in QuickSearchBox (Google PlayStore or Xiaomi Market).
Go to the module settings to select marketplace.
No need to reboot after changing settings.
module.author: BurgerZ

module.name: Volume Control Mute
module.summary: Disables ugly BEEP sound while adjusting volume
module.description: This module disables (mutes) the beeper while adjusting volume at home screen (floating volume panel).
module.author: BurgerZ

module.name: YellowPage
module.summary: Local YellowPage database
module.description: Blocks updates of the Yellow Pages database from Chinese server and adds the ability to "Mark" unknown contacts.
module.author: BurgerZ

module.name: Volume Skip Track
module.summary: Allows to skip tracks in Music player by volume keys
module.description: Allows to skip tracks in Music player by volume keys (while phone screen is off).
module.author: BurgerZ

module.name: Extra Battery info
module.summary: Adds extra battery info to battery settings
module.description: Adds extra battery info to battery settings
module.author: BurgerZ

module.name: Hide Icons Text
module.summary: Hides launcher icon labels
module.description: Allows you to to hide launcher icon and folder labels.
module.author: BurgerZ

module.name: KeyboardFix
module.summary: Fixes FC in Xperia TM keyboard
module.description: Fixes FC in Xperia TM keyboard.
module.author: BurgerZ

version.changelog: • Updated translations

module.name: MMS Festival
module.summary: Russian SMS festival
module.description:
Replaces the Chinese online database of SMS-congratulations to Russian server miui.su.
If the tab "Pre-written" is missing, it must be enabled in MMS application settings, you can update content by pressing "Menu" - "Update"
module.author: BurgerZ

version.changelog: • Added update server settings (romz.bz, miui.su, miui.com)

module.name: Holidays
module.summary: Russian, Ukrainian holidays for calendar and alarm
module.description:
Adds the ability to select the settings of holidays in calendar.


In module settings available servers are: miui.com, romz.bz and miui.su.

Available holidays:

  • Original (Chinese)
  • Russian
  • Ukrainian
module.author: BurgerZ

module.name: NetworkLocation fix
module.summary: NetworkLocation update time fix
module.description:
Changes wakelock minimum update interval from 20 seconds to much more value.
This mod reduces battery drain.
module.author: BurgerZ

module.name: Updater Replacement
module.summary: Choose the app to start from "About phone" screen
module.description: Choose the application to start from "About phone" screen by clicking on "System updates" button.
module.author: BurgerZ

module.name: WSM tools
module.summary: This is the installer and manager for the Xposed framework, which is a requirement for all modules
module.description:
This is the installer for the Xposed framework, which is a requirement for all modules.

This framework is based on rovo89\'s Xposed framework. Like an original project it is a framework for modules that can change the behavior of the system and apps without touching any APKs

Note that this only works with root access on Android 4.0.3 or later.
module.author: BurgerZ

version.changelog: • Fixes. Fixes. Fixes.

• Fixed bootloop for ported devices (MIUI v5 ROMs based on Android 4.2.2). Tested on Huawei Ascend P1, HTC Desire S.
  • Fixed bootloop for HTC One devices.

• Fixed non-scrollable settings page
  • Added Thai translation (thanks to gooagolf GitHub user)

• Updated binaries: app_process (v46), XposedBridge.jar (v42)
  • Updated translations

• Updated binaries: app_process to v46, XposedBridge to v40. This update supports Android 4.4 KitKat
  • Added WhatsNew button: now you can see development progress of WSM Project in realtime mode
  • Added donations button to the About screen
  • Updated translations

• Updated binaries
  • Many fixes, additions and improvements
  • Updated translations

• Fixed modules list overscroll issues
  • Updated translations

• Added Chinese (zh-rTW) translation
  • Fixed translations to avoid WSM tools FC on some languages (with old translation versions)

• Fixed updates version check
  • Fixed installer prompt after ROM update.
  • Small cosmetics fixes.

• Added Xposed repository (available in settings). Both repositories will be shown in the same list, WSM modules will have "MI" image at the bottom right corner.
  • Alert dialog will popup when WSM tools update available.
  • Added Feedback to settings.
  • Reworked About screen.
  • Reworked Manage screen.
  • Small fixes.

• Since v2.0.0 WSM can handle MIUI resources
  • Check for updates moved from About to Settings
  • Updated framework
• Since v2.0.0 WSM can handle MIUI resources
